name: Prabhat Joshi
text:
Excellent places to celebrate birthday and family get-togethers.
This is my third birthday celebration at this place and I've always liked the üçï. Very nice gaming option and adequate for the kids.

name: David Little
text: Good place to bring the kids for pizza and games.  The pizza is good quality unlike other similar places.  The game selection is somewhat limited but still decent for smaller kids and toddlers. The staff has always been friendly and the place is clean.  Overall a good place to spend an hour on a Friday night.

name: Judith's sweet shop
text: Really good place

name: Christine Rowlan
text: Love this Peter Piper. It's a little smaller but they still have a jungle gym which my younger ones love. You can also see the whole play area from the dining area or sit in the dining area way up front if you don't want to be by the ‚Ä¶More

name: sportsdocaz
text: This is a good place for a little kid‚Äôs birthday party. It can get VERY busy on the weekends. I could not imagine coming here really just to eat the food. The pizza isn‚Äôt bad, but nothing to rave about. They have recently added a bunch of ‚Ä¶More

name: Celsa Stiffler
text: Definitely worthy of trying it out and making it a regular if it is not too far. The sauce was pretty amazing and on the top end of pizzas in the city.  Service was also great by the way!

name: Stan Thomasson
text: Came here for our grandson's birthday party. The mom is very busy so it was nice to have a place that can take care of everything for the party. The kids love the games and how do you turn down a request for more tokens. Just good old fashion fun and a little competition we the kids. A good price for a fun time together.

name: Matthew Kuraja
text: Multiple games were not giving out the expected tickets for prizes. Some games were out of order and would just reset in the middle of the game. Many parents were telling staff but the staff didn't seem to do anything about it. They just ‚Ä¶More

name: Clinton Landry
text: Always have a good time at this particular Peter Piper. I had my 3 year old's birthday here. There were a few mistakes and the staff corrected it immediate. The eating area and game area always seem to be well kept for a kids style pizza place.

name: Sean Rice
text: It's a Peter Piper pizza. As these places go, this was newer and cleaner than others I've been to. We were here for a birthday party, and the kids really had a good time, even on a smallish token budget. The pizza isn't terrible either, but it's not anything really special.

name: Deborah Romero
text: Great staff, very helpful with the birthday party! Excellent! I would recommend for any party or just a night out with the family!

name: Katherine Cloos
text: The first time we came was amazing. Just spent $40 on just tokens. So many of the games wouldn't spit tickets out or took our tokens and the games wouldn't even work. We had to ask for help between every other game.  I wouldn't waste your money..

name: Shutitdownnow06
text: Raelly good food and good staff

name: mike melanson
text: Kid loved it, as expected!  Would love an expanded beer menu for the adults listening to kids running around and yelling all day... think of the parents!

name: Steven Phillips
text: Really disappointing, took my son there for his birthday. It was the only place he wanted to go and they booked the entire place for a PTA event. Should build in a buffer so those people that would still like to visit and spend the evening/money can do so.

name: Autumn lucchetti
text:
Just spent $60 to take my kids to have fun
The only reason they get one star was the food was good but the 75% of the games didn't work they either stole tokens or didn't give tickets or they were just ‚Ä¶More

name: Jessica Chandler
text: Fun family place loud with the kiddos running around but that's expected easy to win games and prizes. The only down fall is if its not your regular Peter Piper and you have leftover tickets, you have to use them only at that location so it can be a pain

name: Juan Martinrz
text: Good customer service place with clean games were good good time

name: Bob Wilcox
text: Went for the lunch buffet and was disappointed. I got there when it started and I could tell the pizza had been sitting out for a while. After all the original pizza got eaten and they made fresh ones.it was much better. Many of the games are now two coins so it cost a lot more to keep the kids entertained.

name: Leo guzman
text: It was ok.. may i suggest to add sauce to the middle of the pizza not just at the crust area. If i wanted cheese pizza no sauce i qould have ordered it. Also don't make the holes at the bottom of the pizza a solid crust on the bottom is way ‚Ä¶More

text: We love Peter piper pizza,  we have all are Birthdays there.

name: gingerdeadman 31

name: Michael Potavin
text: I am always satisfied with the service here even though sometimes mistakes are made. We asked for a medium veggie pizza, got a veggie with sausage, which for some might be an upgrade, but we are vegetarian, so nope. We were hand delivered ‚Ä¶More
